_source.short_desc: Industry-leading data protection helps businesses of all sizes through data encryption, compliance, file management and cloud backup.
_source.long_desc: Industry-leading data protection system which helps businesses of all sizes through data encryption, compliance, file management and cloud backup. Protect against accidental deletion, theft, hardware failure, and data corruption. Restore data following a ransomware attack without paying ransom and retain business data to meet compliance requirements. Automatic backup, with award winning support makes data protection seamless.
_source.pricing_details: Carbonite offers Home, Home & Office and Business solutions. The price varies from $59 per computer per yer to $599 per year.
_source.target_audience: Designed for businesses of all sizes, a data protection solution that helps with supporting FERPA, GLBA & HIPAA, centralizing admin controls, creating backup for applications, reporting storage.

category_features.name: Backup Log
category_features.definition: Records the events that occur during a backup process

category_features.name: Backup Scheduling
category_features.definition: Allows automatic backups (with all filtering, compressing, transferring to the storage, and other)

category_features.name: Cloud Backup
category_features.definition: Allows back up of files to cloud storage like Google Drive, OneDrive, Dropbox

category_features.name: Compression
category_features.definition: Reduction in the number of bits needed to represent data

category_features.name: Encryption
category_features.definition: Convert data into a code for security

category_features.name: Incremental Backup
category_features.definition: Copy only the new data that has been changed or created since the previous backup

category_features.name: Data Security
category_features.definition: Protect digital privacy and secure data

category_features.name: Endpoint Protection
category_features.definition: Protect users working remotely and provide secure environments for personal devices to access company programs

category_features.name: Network Security
category_features.definition: Prevent and monitor unauthorized access, misuse, modification, or denial of a computer network and network-accessible resources

category_features.name: Real Time Monitoring
category_features.definition: Track system's health and performance continuously with information and updates being available instantly at any point in time

related_products.short_desc: Cybersecurity application for IT administrators to prevent data breaches, covering a suite of devices, networks, and applications.
related_products.features: ESET Endpoint Security software is a cloud-based and on-premises application for internet security and malware protection. It has a global user base that comprises businesses of every size. Cloud sandbox technology enables users to protect their mobile devices, laptops, and desktops against ransomware, zero-day attacks, and data breaches. It features file, bot, and mail protection, along with remote device management, virtualization security, firewall set-up, and web control.

related_products.short_desc: IDrive protects all your PCs, Macs, mobile devices and servers into one cloud backup account.
related_products.features:
IDrive Backup is a versatile solution that allows users to backup an unlimited number of devices into one account, including PCs, Macs, mobile devices, and servers.

IDrive offers backup plans for consumers, small businesses, and enterprises of any size, giving users peace of mind that their data is protected and recoverable at all times.

related_products.short_desc: Endpoint data loss protection and security platform that enables small businesses to manage recovery of deleted files and more.
related_products.features: Endpoint data loss protection and security platform that enables small businesses and organizations to recover lost data caused through human error, ransomware or any other online disaster, where the recovered files can be tracked through status reports.

related_products.short_desc: The most reliable and easy-to-use backup for businesses of all sizes. Now with simplified licensing and active ransomware protection
related_products.features: Acronis Cyber Backup keeps costs low and productivity high. It ensures unlimited scalability, protects any workload, and leverages any storage and/or cloud. Balancing the value of data and infrastructure costs, its uniquely intuitive web-based management console makes it easy to monitor and schedule backups while built-in AI-based technologies prevents cryptomining attacks.

related_products.short_desc: Virtual Machine Backup and Replication for Hyper-V & VMware - Try it for free for 30 days. (Freeware available for micro-businesses.)
related_products.features: Altaro VM Backup is a virtual machine backup and replication solution for Hyper-V and VMware. Designed for IT departments, IT resellers and consultants, and Managed Service Providers (MSPs), it provides robust, streamlined, enterprise-level functionality, such as WAN-Optimized Replication, CDP, Augmented Inline Deduplication and more. It is characterized by ease of use, speed, affordability  and a Lightning Fast Support Call Response Guarantee of under 30 seconds. Try it for free for 30 days.

related_products.short_desc: Ninja Data Protection is a secure & reliable backup solution for all Windows endpoint giving you granular control over backup targets.
related_products.features: Ninja Data Protection is a secure, reliable, cloud-first backup solution for all Windows endpoints. Ninja backup allows file-only and full image backup, granular control over backup targets, schedules, and retention plans & more. Ninja's unified backup & endpoint platform enables  IT teams to proactively manage endpoints and protect critical business data from device failure or ransomware, providing peace of mind from day one.

related_products.short_desc: Powerful cross-platform backup and disaster recovery that leverages the public cloud to enable a comprehensive data protection strategy
related_products.features:
MSP360 Managed Backup. Simple. Reliable.

MSP360 Managed Backup is an easy-to-use backup solution with centralized management, monitoring, and reporting. The platform is natively integrated with AWS, Wasabi, Backblaze B2, and Microsoft Azure to enable best-in-class data protection for Windows, Linux, macOS, VMware, Hyper-V, Microsoft 365, and Google Workspace.

related_products.short_desc: With Virtual Machine Manager (VMM) you can set up and run various virtual machines, including Windows and Linux, on Synology NAS.
related_products.features: Virtual Machine Manager opens up abundant possibilities. You can set up and run various virtual machines, including Windows, Linux, and Ubuntu, on one Synology NAS. Easily allocate hardware resources such as computing power, storage space, or network interfaces among several virtual machines. Clone, restore, or create a failover of virtual machines within seconds, and rest assured that you can rollback any  failure at any time.

related_products.short_desc: Versatile backup solution designed for MSPs to offer managed backup service and earn recurring income.
related_products.features: Ahsay Cloud Backup Suite is specifically designed for Managed Service Providers, System Integrator's and IT Consulting Companies. It can empower you to offer secure managed, cloud based, and on-premises backup service to your business or end customers and earn recurring income. Supports database backup for;MS SQL, MS Exchange, Oracle, MySQL, and MariaDB. Virtual machine backup for VMware and Hyper-V, Synology and QNAP NAS devices, Android & iOS mobile devices, and Microsoft 365.

related_products.short_desc: 12,000 Customers backup with CloudAlly top-rated SaaS backup & recovery to protect all their business-critical Office 365 data on AWS
related_products.features:
Top Rated Pioneers of Cloud to Cloud Backup for Microsoft Office 365 - with 12,000 customers!

Protect your business-critical Office 365 data with CloudAllys enterprise-grade SaaS backup and point-in-time recovery for Microsoft 365 (Mail, Calendar, Contacts, and Tasks), SharePoint Online, OneDrive, and Groups/Teams. Our Office 365 SaaS backup is tailored for Office 365 administrators and security-focused IT professionals. 
CloudAlly is an OpenText Company

related_products.short_desc: Comprehensive enterprise backup solution for all workloads, combining data protection for backups, replicas, storage snapshots and CDP.
related_products.features:
Comprehensive enterprise backup solution for all workloads, combining data protection for backups, replicas, storage snapshots and CDP replicas under one control panel. 
Veeam provides backup, restore and replication for virtual machines and cloud-based workloads, as well as physical servers and workstations. VMware, Hyper-V, AWS, Azure, Windows, Linux, Nutanix AHV and Google GCP are supported. 
Veeam also delivers multiple integrations with leading storage vendors and service providers.

similar_products.short_desc: Cove Data Protection offers backup, disaster recovery, and archiving. Protect servers, workstations, and Microsoft 365 with Cove.
similar_products.features: Cove Data Protection offers backup, disaster recovery, and archiving for the cloud-first world. Protect servers, workstations, and Microsoft 365 with efficient data protection as a service. Includes cloud storage and a unified multitenant dashboard. Save time, use less storage, and keep backups safer from ransomware with Cove.

similar_products.features:

similar_products.short_desc: If managing backups is just one of your countless responsibilities in IT, then consider Unitrends Backup for all-in-one ease-of-use.
similar_products.features: If managing backups is just one of your countless responsibilities in IT, then consider Unitrends for all-in-one ease-of-use. Unitrends Backup Software is a prepackaged virtual appliance with fully integrated backup, replication, deduplication, archive, and instant recovery. Run it on vSphere, Hyper-V, XenServer, or deploy it as a VM within the Azure or AWS cloud. Integrate with our cloud which is purpose-built for effortless, cost-efficient backup, offsite storage, long-term retention and DRaaS

similar_products.short_desc: Qumulo is the leading file data platform for data management and storage across multi-cloud environments.
similar_products.features:
Qumulo's disruptive file data platform is defining a new category in enterprise data management, providing its customers the most advanced solution available in the market for managing and accessing file data to create new services and applications. 

We built a unified file data platform to support the entire data lifecycle with powerful data services, right out of the box. Manage, store, and build with unstructured data at massive scale, anywhere you want.

similar_products.short_desc: Powerful cross-platform backup and disaster recovery that leverages the public cloud to enable a comprehensive data protection strategy
similar_products.features:
MSP360 Managed Backup. Simple. Reliable.

MSP360 Managed Backup is an easy-to-use backup solution with centralized management, monitoring, and reporting. The platform is natively integrated with AWS, Wasabi, Backblaze B2, and Microsoft Azure to enable best-in-class data protection for Windows, Linux, macOS, VMware, Hyper-V, Microsoft 365, and Google Workspace.

similar_products.short_desc: Rubrik simplifies backup and recovery across hybrid cloud environments. Eliminate legacy complexity by consolidating disparate hardware
similar_products.features: Rubrik is a backup and recovery solution best suited for midsized to enterprise businesses (500+ employees). Rubrik delivers instant application availability to hybrid cloud enterprises for recovery, search, cloud, and development. By using the market-leading Cloud Data Management platform, customers mobilize applications, automate protection policies, recover from Ransomware, search and analyze application data at scale on one platform. From days to seconds.

similar_products.short_desc: Spanning solutions are trusted by over 10,000 organizations to provide data protection for Microsoft 365, G Suite, and Salesforce.
similar_products.features: Spanning's cloud-native, purpose-built solutions for Microsoft 365, G Suite, and Salesforce provide powerful capabilities to protect your organization's critical data from loss - unique in enabling end-users as well as administrators to quickly find and restore data in just a few clicks. With enterprise-class security and compliance, Spanning solutions meet the rigorous requirements for listing on Microsoft AppSource, Salesforce AppExchange and the G Suite Marketplace.

similar_products.short_desc: Start running backups and restores in less than 15 minutes! Comet is a fast, secure all-in-one backup platform for IT professionals.
similar_products.features:
Start running backups and restores in less than 15 minutes! Comet is a fast, secure all-in-one backup platform for businesses and IT providers. You control your backup environment and storage destination (local, AWS, Google Cloud Storage, Azure, Backblaze, Wasabi, or other S3 storage providers).

Our backup software supports businesses across 120 countries in 12 languages. Simple, profitable pricing. No contracts. Support, updates, replication, and re-branding are all free. 30-day FREE trial!

similar_products.short_desc: Axcient x360Recover is the most reliable, flexible and cost-effective business continuity and disaster recovery solution for MSPs.
similar_products.features: Axcient x360Recover is the most reliable, flexible and cost-effective business continuity and disaster recovery (BCDR) solution for MSPs and the SMBs they serve.  x360Recover protects data from cyberthreats with a solution that is simple to deploy and manage. Delivered as a flexible direct-to-cloud or appliance-based deployment, x360Recover covers nearly all BDR use cases-including appliance, server, and cloud-to-cloud-and is built on Axcient's proprietary Chain-Free backup technology.

similar_products.short_desc: Effortlessly backup and restore ExchangeOnline, OneDrive, SharePoint, and Teams  including all files, folders, and document libraries.
similar_products.features: Axcient x360Cloud protects and secures Microsoft 365 and Google Workspace data by providing complete backup and restore for Exchange Online, OneDrive, SharePoint, and Teams, plus Google Drive, including Google Docs, Files, and Folders. x360Cloud supports cloud-to-cloud backup directly from Microsoft 365 or Google Workspace to the Axcient Cloud, and is HIPAA, SOC-2, and GDPR compliant. x360Cloud allows MSPs avoid the risks of being 100% dependent on Microsoft or Google for business continuity.

similar_products.short_desc: A backup solution for your Active Directory, Office 365, and on-premises Exchange environments.
similar_products.features: RecoveryManager Plus is an integrated backup and recovery solution for your Exchange Online, on-premises Exchange, and Google Workspace mailboxes. Backup and restore all items in your mailboxes, including all attachments. Export entire Exchange Online and on-premises Exchange mailboxes or just a part of it as a PST file and secure them with a password for an additional layer of security.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Business Continuity software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Business Continuity tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Business Continuity software helps organizations to identify threats and plan for the prevention and recovery of information assets. These applications protect key organizational data in the event of a failure and in the wake of trouble, aid the rapid restoration of system function and data access. Typically Business Continuity solutions offer options for continuous or scheduled monitoring along with a variety of real-time data recovery tools. Backup storage can be maintained locally or routed to a remote server. Business Continuity software is related to Database Management software.

Quickly browse through hundreds of Data Loss Prevention tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Data Loss Prevention software keeps corporate sensitive data secure by identifying potential data breaches and helping to eliminate them.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Disk Imaging software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Disk Imaging tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Disk Imaging software assists organizations with creating copies, known as images, of data storage devices, such as optical disks, flash drives, SSDs, and hard drives to backup and restore disk data in cases of system failure, disk decommissioning, or forensic analysis.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top File Sharing software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of File Sharing tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: File Sharing software gives you the ability to quickly and securely share data across your company and with external partners. Sync your data across all your devices, access files and information from anywhere, and solve your data storage problems with file sharing software. Need more help? Visit the Collaboration software, Document Management software, Content Management software, and Portal software categories.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top File Sync software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of File Sync tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: File Sync software ensures that files stored in multiple locations or edited by multiple people contain the same information.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Server Backup software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Server Backup tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Server Backup software protects server data by duplicating it at regular intervals.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Virtual Machine software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Virtual Machine tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Virtual Machine software is used in place of corresponding hardware. Virtual Machines, or VMs, include virtual desktops, virtual servers, and virtual operating systems. Several different virtual operating systems can be installed on one physical computer.

category_features.name: CPU Monitoring
category_features.definition: Monitor performance details involving CPU/memory utilization

category_features.name: Credential Management
category_features.definition: Change passwords so that the locally stored password on the client can be updated at the same time it is modified on the server

category_features.name: Email Monitoring
category_features.definition: Ability to oversee and optimize the operations of a mail server

category_features.name: Event Logs
category_features.definition: A record of actions or occurrences recognized by software

category_features.name: Patch Management
category_features.definition: Install software updates and bug fixes remotely

category_features.name: Scheduling
category_features.definition: Plan availability and assign specific time slots for tasks and resources

category_features.name: Server Monitoring
category_features.definition: Continuously scan servers on a designated network to monitor health and search for any irregularities or failures

category_features.name: Virtual Machine Monitoring
category_features.definition: Manages the operation of virtualized environment on top of a physical host machine

related_products.short_desc: Box empowers teams to work from anywhere with a single, secure collaboration platform built for the entire content lifecycle.
related_products.features: Your business runs on content, and it's time you put it to work. Sales contracts, product specs, marketing assets and videos - files like these are at the heart of your processes, no matter your industry. With the Box Content Cloud, you get a single, secure, easy-to-use platform built for the entire content lifecycle, from file creation and sharing, to editing, signature, and retention. Trusted by 100K+ leading organizations, Box has been named a Leader by all major industry analyst firms.

related_products.short_desc: Tableau helps people and organizations become more data-driven as the trusted leader in analytics. Learn More!
related_products.features: Tableau helps people transform data into actionable insights that make an impact. Easily connect to data stored anywhere, in any format. Quickly perform ad hoc analyses that reveal hidden opportunities. Drag and drop to create interactive dashboards with advanced visual analytics. Then share your work with anyone and make an impact on your business. From global enterprises to early-stage startups and small businesses, people everywhere use Tableau to see and understand their data. Learn More!

related_products.short_desc: Download free IT help desk software for IT pros & sysadmins around the world in all businesses. Support & mobile apps also free.
related_products.features: The Spiceworks IT Help Desk is purpose-built for IT pros, we have just what you need to run a better internal IT help desk and a better business. Start tackling tickets in minutes with free help desk software (on your server or in the cloud). Plus, it's more than just ticket tracking: understand (and change!) team behavior and articulate your value to the business. Get it free today!

related_products.short_desc: The secure file sharing and storage solution built for business. Featuring state-of-the-art, compliance-supporting security.
related_products.features: Take productivity to the next level with ShareFile. Securely send, share, get feedback, approvals and even e-signatures on any file, fast. Business-class file sharing meets real-time collaboration to accelerate productivity with automated workflows you customize and control.  Give real-time feedback, request approvals, co-edit-even get legally binding e-signatures seamlessly-on any device. Plus, with real-time tracking, you always know exactly where things stand.  Using SSAE 16 Type II certified

related_products.short_desc: Protect your business from viruses, ransomware, and email threats including spam, phishing, and more.
related_products.features: AVG Internet Security Business Edition protects your business from viruses, ransomware, and email threats including spam, phishing, and more. Our top-rated antivirus protects your business by blocking cyberthreats, keeping your data secure, and allowing remote access from a management console. AVG Cloud Management Console is an easy-to-use platform that allows you to quickly deploy antivirus to multiple endpoints, manage policies, monitor threats, schedule updates, and secure devices.

related_products.short_desc: Atera is the ultimate all-in-one RMM Software for MSPs and IT Pros. Fixed Cost with unlimited servers and devices. Try for free today!
related_products.features: Atera is an all-in-one, cloud based, IT services platform that provides a powerful and integrated solution built for MSPs and IT departments. Atera includes everything you need in one place: Full remote monitoring and management (RMM), remote access, helpdesk, ticketing, chat, network discovery, PSA, reports, billing and so much more. You just pay per technician and get unlimited Servers, Workstations and Device monitoring. Start your free trial today!

related_products.short_desc: Cloud software that connects people, systems & data into a single view for visibility and actionable intelligence across operations.
related_products.features: PagerDuty, Inc. (NYSE:PD) is a leader in digital operations management. In an always-on world, organizations of all sizes trust PagerDuty to help them deliver a perfect digital experience to their customers, every time. Teams use PagerDuty to identify issues and opportunities in real time and bring together the right people to fix problems faster and prevent them in the future.

related_products.short_desc: Thousands of MSPs and IT Departments use Kaseya VSA IT management software to automate IT. Start your free trial!
related_products.features: MSPs and internal IT departments use Kaseya VSA to manage servers and virtual machines. Powerful automation allows you to automate common IT processes like routine server maintenance Get real-time visibility to the patch status of the devices in your IT environment.

related_products.short_desc: The JumpCloud Directory Platform reimagines the directory as a complete platform for identity, access, and device management.
related_products.features: JumpCloud's cloud directory enables internal IT departments, MSPs, VARs/distributors, and DevOps teams to securely and easily enable access to any IT resource, from anywhere. Simplify how you manage your core IT infrastructure, whether it's an on-prem data center, cloud server, or serverless infrastructure. Streamline the way you manage and provision access to your organization's servers, from cloud RADIUS and LDAP servers to virtual servers.

related_products.short_desc: With Pulseway Server Management Platform get insight over the real-time status of AD, IIS, SQL Server, MS Exchange, VMware & more.
related_products.features: Servers uptime and performance is critical to organizations, they affect the productivity of all the users, that is why Pulseway has built-in powerful core functionality for servers. Get insight over the real-time status of Active Directory, IIS, SQL Server, Microsoft Exchange, VMware, Hyper-V, Windows Server Backup, XenServer, SCOM and more ? all from the same intuitive Pulseway interface, with the same powerful features such as workflow automation.

related_products.short_desc: New Relic is the only unified data platform that empowers engineers to get all telemetry paired with powerful full-stack analysis tools
related_products.features: New Relic One empowers engineers with a data-driven approach to planning, building, deploying and running software. Offering the only unified data platform that empowers engineers to get all telemetry paired with powerful full-stack analysis tools, New Relic helps engineers get past the what to uncover the why. This improves uptime, reliability and efficiency to deliver exceptional customer experiences that fuel growth. Uncover the why with New Relic.

similar_products.short_desc: Monitor the performance of your servers across platforms such as Windows, Linux, FreeBSD and OS X with Site24x7 server monitoring.
similar_products.features: Track the performance of Windows, Linux, FreeBSD, and OS X servers with more than 60 performance metrics including CPU, disk, memory, thread, and handle count of processes and services. In addition to monitoring servers, install ready-to-use 50+ plugin integrations and Microsoft applications including IIS, SQL, and Exchange.

similar_products.short_desc: Network Performance Monitor (NPM) is affordable software that can help you detect, diagnose, and resolve network performance issues.
similar_products.features: SolarWinds Network Performance Monitor (NPM) is a powerful and affordable solution that can help you quickly detect, diagnose, and resolve network performance problems and outages. NPM provides advanced network troubleshooting for on-premise, hybrid, and cloud services with critical path hop-by-hop analysis. NPM's comprehensive coverage is designed to enable an IT professional to reduce mean outage time, see return on network investments & determine how to reallocate resources for future health.

similar_products.short_desc: With Pulseway Server Management Platform get insight over the real-time status of AD, IIS, SQL Server, MS Exchange, VMware & more.
similar_products.features: Servers uptime and performance is critical to organizations, they affect the productivity of all the users, that is why Pulseway has built-in powerful core functionality for servers. Get insight over the real-time status of Active Directory, IIS, SQL Server, Microsoft Exchange, VMware, Hyper-V, Windows Server Backup, XenServer, SCOM and more ? all from the same intuitive Pulseway interface, with the same powerful features such as workflow automation.

similar_products.short_desc: ipMonitor? is a lightweight, affordable, and agentless IT monitoring solution for your network, servers, and applications.
similar_products.features: SolarWinds ipMonitor is designed to provide essential, affordable IT monitoring for network devices, servers, and applications. From a single console, you can see the status of your devices, CPU, memory, and disk usage, and any performance issues with your critical processes. ipMonitor is lightweight and can typically be up and running in minutes. It's a self-contained, dependency-free solution that's built so you can skip the hassle and expense of additional components.

similar_products.short_desc: NinjaOne is the easiest, all-in-one remote management and monitoring solution that MSPs and IT professionals love.
similar_products.features: NinjaOne is an all-in-one SaaS IT monitoring and management platform with a robust set of features to help you design, plan, deliver, operate and control IT services. You can manage network devices including windows and mac endpoints, perform patching, access remotely, deploy and run antivirus scans, automate scripts across all devices, monitor website performance and more. Built on an easy and intuitive cloud-based platform, you can get up and running in 5 minutes, no servers required.

similar_products.short_desc: ManageEngine OpManager is 5 in 1 integrated network management software for performance monitoring, fault diagnosis & troubleshooting.
similar_products.features: ManageEngine OpManager is an integrated network management platform that helps large enterprises, service providers, and SMEs manage their data centers & IT infrastructure efficiently and cost effectively. It offers network performance monitoring, physical and virtual server monitoring, traffic analysis, configuration management, firewall log management and IP address management. It provides business view, email/sms based alerts, workflow automation, customized reports and combined snapshot view

similar_products.short_desc: Whether in the cloud, on-premises, or a combination, with Collaborate you can monitor, troubleshoot, alert, diagnose, test, and analyze
similar_products.features:
Unified communications, collaboration, and contact center ecosystems form the basis of some of the most essential business systems. As hybrid working becomes the norm and the demand for a seamless user experience increases, the need for high up-time, fast problem resolution, and intelligent insight is critical. 

IR Collaborate is an enterprise-grade performance and experience management solution for voice, video, collaboration and contact center environments.

similar_products.short_desc: The N-able N-central? remote monitoring and management platform is designed to make managing complex IT networks simple.
similar_products.features: The N-able N-central? remote monitoring and management platform is designed to help managed services providers handle complex networks with ease. With extensive automation and in-depth configurability options, security features like antivirus, endpoint detection and response, patch management, and integrated backup, N-central is built to help MSP businesses efficiently manage intricate networks from one easy-to-use platform.

similar_products.short_desc: Exchange Reporter Plus is a web-based hybrid Exchange reporting, auditing, monitoring, and content search solution.
similar_products.features: Exchange Reporter Plus is a web-based tool used to report on, audit, monitor and perform content search in Exchange Server, Exchange Online and Skype for Business. It features over 450 comprehensive reports on various Exchange objects, such as mailboxes, public folders, and distribution lists.  The tool audits granular changes and monitors the server and services 24x7. Alerts in Exchange Reporter Plus give instant notifications on critical events that require your attention.

similar_products.short_desc: Atera is the ultimate all-in-one RMM Software for MSPs and IT Pros. Fixed Cost with unlimited servers and devices. Try for free today!
similar_products.features: Atera is an all-in-one, cloud based, IT services platform that provides a powerful and integrated solution built for MSPs and IT departments. Atera includes everything you need in one place: Full remote monitoring and management (RMM), remote access, helpdesk, ticketing, chat, network discovery, PSA, reports, billing and so much more. You just pay per technician and get unlimited Servers, Workstations and Device monitoring. Start your free trial today!

similar_products.short_desc: Web-based SSH Key and SSL/TLS Certificate Management Solution for Enterprises
similar_products.features: ManageEngine Key Manager Plus is a web-based key management solution that helps you consolidate, control, manage, monitor, and audit the entire life cycle of SSH (Secure Shell) keys and SSL (Secure Sockets Layer) certificates. It provides visibility into the SSH and SSL/TLS environments and helps administrators take total control of the keys to preempt breaches and compliance issues.

similar_products.short_desc: The JumpCloud Directory Platform reimagines the directory as a complete platform for identity, access, and device management.
similar_products.features: JumpCloud's cloud directory enables internal IT departments, MSPs, VARs/distributors, and DevOps teams to securely and easily enable access to any IT resource, from anywhere. Simplify how you manage your core IT infrastructure, whether it's an on-prem data center, cloud server, or serverless infrastructure. Streamline the way you manage and provision access to your organization's servers, from cloud RADIUS and LDAP servers to virtual servers.

similar_products.short_desc: EventLog Analyzer is a comprehensive log management solution that provides multiple security capabilities on a centralized platform.
similar_products.features: EventLog Analyzer, a comprehensive log management solution, collects, analyzes, correlates, searches, and archives log data from endpoints, firewalls, servers, databases, applications, and more. It provides visibility into network activity, spots suspicious activities through incident detection mechanisms such as event correlation, threat intelligence and more, mitigates potential threats and offers audit-ready report templates that help enterprises to comply with IT mandates at ease.

Quickly browse through hundreds of Data Center Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Data Center Management software allows users to monitor and control all connected networks and devices across an entire organization. This type of software allows for application delivery, trouble shooting, and reporting across the organizational network. Data Center Management software is related to IT Asset Management software, Data Storage software, Database Management software, Network Monitoring software, and Network Security software.

Quickly browse through hundreds of Database Monitoring tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Database Monitoring software helps organizations to track, optimize and diagnose performance of their database applications.

related_categories.description: Load Balancing software includes virtual appliances that monitor and distribute excess traffic between corporate servers ensuring that corporate websites maintain a constant loading speed.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Network Monitoring software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Network Monitoring tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Network Monitoring software assesses and evaluates computer systems and networks in order to maximize availability of system resources. These applications provide an integrated solution for ongoing observation, evaluation and forecasting as well as historical assessments. Organizations use the diagnostic tools provided by Network Monitoring software to identify problem areas and make strategic resource decisions regarding their technology operations. Network Monitoring software is related to Application Performance Management software, Network Security software and IT Management software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Patch Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Patch Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Patch Management software keeps servers and network hardware up to date by automating the discovery and delivery of missing patches and updates. Patches can be pushed to servers and validated in a short period of time. Companies and programmers can stay ahead of software threats by monitoring vulnerability and automating the response to exploits launched into a system. Patch Management software is related to Server Management software, Requirements Management software, and Website Monitoring software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Virtualization software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Virtualization tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Virtualization software allows multiple virtual operating systems to run on a single physical machine, providing greater productivity. Virtualization software allocates resources to provide greater efficiency of the machines resources. This type of efficiency can be gained on a single machine, or across an entire network of connected machines. Virtualization software is related to IT Management software.

Quickly browse through hundreds of Website Monitoring tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Website Monitoring software provides monitoring and performance alerts of websites and web-based applications. Companies can easily monitor uptime, web performance and transaction performance as well as quickly determine the location of performance failures. Website monitoring solutions are used in nearly every industry, and most provide real time performance alerts on failures involving HTTP, DNS, TCP and transaction response time. Website Monitoring software is related to Requirements Management software, and Patch Management software.
